note: The next morning, they get driven to school by a chauffeur.
Zane and Athena become celebrities in school.
Wayne becomes volatile at home, abuses mother
Founders announce that top  twenty Matches must compete with others to win money and trip.
They are asked to do interviews
Cameras are sent to them and they have to show affection 24/7
Zane and Athena get to fly to Russia
The Matches are all gathered to a lavish banquet.
The founders of the game announce that viewers that kill the Matches will earn a piece of their fortune.
